::KitKat::

She watched to make sure that Megatron and the others have left. She 
sighed and looked down.  She knew that once she got in the open with 
Megatron, she would be done for. She also had her pack to think of.  
She knew that if she surrendered to Megatron, she only meet her death 
and then nothing would stop him from taking over her group or worse, 
killing them all just to spite her. She felt her spark sink.  She was 
running out of options.

She opened her link to Aracnia. "Look I may need your help yet. I am 
going to ask that you and your groups come here and stay with us. We 
are going to have to work together to stay alive on this one."  SHe 
isghed and hoped that she was doing the right thing.  She turned and 
walked down the hall.  She made it to the lab where she saw her clone 
was about 35% complete.  She sat down in a chair next to the control 
console and sighed. "well, my honor at stake, my group at stake,"  
she looked at the floor, worried for her group. She really didn't 
care if Megatron killed her or not, but she had to make sure her pack 
was safe.
